sqlMap.sql: m.t0_NAME, m.t0_ADDRESS, m.t0_ADDRESS1, m.t0_ADDRESS2, m.t0_ADDRESS3, m.t0_ALIAS1, m.t0_ALIAS2, m.t0_CREATEDBY2DIMUSER, m.t0_CREATEDDATE, m.t0_DESCRIPTION, m.t0_FAX, m.t0_FULLNAME, m.t0_ISVISIBLE, m.t0_LABEL, m.t0_LASTMODIFIEDBY2DIMUSER, m.t0_LASTMODIFIEDDATE, m.t0_LOCATION2FUNCTIONALSTATUS, m.t0_LOCATION2LOCATIONTYPE, m.t0_LOCATION2PARENTLOCATION, m.t0_LOCATION2PROVISIONSTATUS, m.t0_LOCATION2RPBUILDTEMPLATE, m.t0_LOCATIONID, m.t0_MARKEDFORDELETE, m.t0_NOTES, m.t0_OBJECTID, m.t0_PHYSICALX, m.t0_PHYSICALY, m.t0_PHYSICALZ, m.t0_PROVINCE, m.t0_RELATIVENAME, m.t0_RESPONSIBLE, m.t0_SUBSTATUS, m.t0_SUBTYPE, m.t0_TELEPHONE, m.t0_TOWNCITY, m.t0_ZIP

dynamic.isNotEmpty: m.t0_LOCATION2LOCATIONTYPE in (select l.LOCATIONTYPEID from locationtype l where l.name = #BM_CLASS_ID#)

sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO LOCATION ( NAME , ADDRESS , ADDRESS1 , ADDRESS2 , ADDRESS3 , ALIAS1 , ALIAS2 , CREATEDBY2DIMUSER , CREATEDDATE , DESCRIPTION , FAX , FULLNAME , ISVISIBLE , LABEL , LASTMODIFIEDBY2DIMUSER , LASTMODIFIEDDATE , LOCATION2FUNCTIONALSTATUS , LOCATION2LOCATIONTYPE , LOCATION2PARENTLOCATION , LOCATION2PROVISIONSTATUS , LOCATION2RPBUILDTEMPLATE , LOCATIONID , MARKEDFORDELETE , NOTES , OBJECTID , PHYSICALX , PHYSICALY , PHYSICALZ , PROVINCE , RELATIVENAME , RESPONSIBLE , SUBSTATUS , SUBTYPE , TELEPHONE , TOWNCITY , ZIP ) VALUES ( #name# , #address# , #address1# , #address2# , #address3# , #alias1# , #alias2# , #createdby2dimuser# , #createddate# , #description# , #fax# , #fullname# , #isvisible# , #label# , #lastmodifiedby2dimuser# , #lastmodifieddate# , #location2functionalstatus# , #location2locationtype# , #location2parentlocation# , #location2provisionstatus# , #location2rpbuildtemplate# , #locationid# , #markedfordelete# , #notes# , #objectid# , #physicalx# , #physicaly# , #physicalz# , #province# , #relativename# , #responsible# , #substatus# , #subtype# , #telephone# , #towncity# , #zip# )
select sys_guid() AS ID FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update: UPDATE LOCATION SET NAME = #name# , ADDRESS = #address# , ADDRESS1 = #address1# , ADDRESS2 = #address2# , ADDRESS3 = #address3# , ALIAS1 = #alias1# , ALIAS2 = #alias2# , CREATEDBY2DIMUSER = #createdby2dimuser# , CREATEDDATE = #createddate# , DESCRIPTION = #description# , FAX = #fax# , FULLNAME = #fullname# , ISVISIBLE = #isvisible# , LABEL = #label# , LASTMODIFIEDBY2DIMUSER = #lastmodifiedby2dimuser# , LASTMODIFIEDDATE = #lastmodifieddate# , LOCATION2FUNCTIONALSTATUS = #location2functionalstatus# , LOCATION2LOCATIONTYPE = #location2locationtype# , LOCATION2PARENTLOCATION = #location2parentlocation# , LOCATION2PROVISIONSTATUS = #location2provisionstatus# , LOCATION2RPBUILDTEMPLATE = #location2rpbuildtemplate# , MARKEDFORDELETE = #markedfordelete# , NOTES = #notes# , OBJECTID = #objectid# , PHYSICALX = #physicalx# , PHYSICALY = #physicaly# , PHYSICALZ = #physicalz# , PROVINCE = #province# , RELATIVENAME = #relativename# , RESPONSIBLE = #responsible# , SUBSTATUS = #substatus# , SUBTYPE = #subtype# , TELEPHONE = #telephone# , TOWNCITY = #towncity# , ZIP = #zip# WHERE LOCATIONID = #locationid#
sqlMap.select:
select
from (select t0.NAME as t0_NAME, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.ADDRESS1 as t0_ADDRESS1, t0.ADDRESS2 as t0_ADDRESS2, t0.ADDRESS3 as t0_ADDRESS3, t0.ALIAS1 as t0_ALIAS1, t0.ALIAS2 as t0_ALIAS2, t0.CREATEDBY2DIMUSER as t0_CREATEDBY2DIMUSER, t0.CREATEDDATE as t0_CREATEDDATE, t0.DESCRIPTION as t0_DESCRIPTION, t0.FAX as t0_FAX, t0.FULLNAME as t0_FULLNAME, t0.ISVISIBLE as t0_ISVISIBLE, t0.LABEL as t0_LABEL, t0.LASTMODIFIEDBY2DIMUSER as t0_LASTMODIFIEDBY2DIMUSER, t0.LASTMODIFIEDDATE as t0_LASTMODIFIEDDATE, t0.LOCATION2FUNCTIONALSTATUS as t0_LOCATION2FUNCTIONALSTATUS, t0.LOCATION2LOCATIONTYPE as t0_LOCATION2LOCATIONTYPE, t0.LOCATION2PARENTLOCATION as t0_LOCATION2PARENTLOCATION, t0.LOCATION2PROVISIONSTATUS as t0_LOCATION2PROVISIONSTATUS, t0.LOCATION2RPBUILDTEMPLATE as t0_LOCATION2RPBUILDTEMPLATE, t0.LOCATIONID as t0_LOCATIONID, t0.MARKEDFORDELETE as t0_MARKEDFORDELETE, t0.NOTES as t0_NOTES, t0.OBJECTID as t0_OBJECTID, t0.PHYSICALX as t0_PHYSICALX, t0.PHYSICALY as t0_PHYSICALY, t0.PHYSICALZ as t0_PHYSICALZ, t0.PROVINCE as t0_PROVINCE, t0.RELATIVENAME as t0_RELATIVENAME, t0.RESPONSIBLE as t0_RESPONSIBLE, t0.SUBSTATUS as t0_SUBSTATUS, t0.SUBTYPE as t0_SUBTYPE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.TOWNCITY as t0_TOWNCITY, t0.ZIP as t0_ZIP from LOCATION t0 ) m where m.t0_LOCATIONID =#cuid#

select
from ( select t0.NAME as t0_NAME, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.ADDRESS1 as t0_ADDRESS1, t0.ADDRESS2 as t0_ADDRESS2, t0.ADDRESS3 as t0_ADDRESS3, t0.ALIAS1 as t0_ALIAS1, t0.ALIAS2 as t0_ALIAS2, t0.CREATEDBY2DIMUSER as t0_CREATEDBY2DIMUSER, t0.CREATEDDATE as t0_CREATEDDATE, t0.DESCRIPTION as t0_DESCRIPTION, t0.FAX as t0_FAX, t0.FULLNAME as t0_FULLNAME, t0.ISVISIBLE as t0_ISVISIBLE, t0.LABEL as t0_LABEL, t0.LASTMODIFIEDBY2DIMUSER as t0_LASTMODIFIEDBY2DIMUSER, t0.LASTMODIFIEDDATE as t0_LASTMODIFIEDDATE, t0.LOCATION2FUNCTIONALSTATUS as t0_LOCATION2FUNCTIONALSTATUS, t0.LOCATION2LOCATIONTYPE as t0_LOCATION2LOCATIONTYPE, t0.LOCATION2PARENTLOCATION as t0_LOCATION2PARENTLOCATION, t0.LOCATION2PROVISIONSTATUS as t0_LOCATION2PROVISIONSTATUS, t0.LOCATION2RPBUILDTEMPLATE as t0_LOCATION2RPBUILDTEMPLATE, t0.LOCATIONID as t0_LOCATIONID, t0.MARKEDFORDELETE as t0_MARKEDFORDELETE, t0.NOTES as t0_NOTES, t0.OBJECTID as t0_OBJECTID, t0.PHYSICALX as t0_PHYSICALX, t0.PHYSICALY as t0_PHYSICALY, t0.PHYSICALZ as t0_PHYSICALZ, t0.PROVINCE as t0_PROVINCE, t0.RELATIVENAME as t0_RELATIVENAME, t0.RESPONSIBLE as t0_RESPONSIBLE, t0.SUBSTATUS as t0_SUBSTATUS, t0.SUBTYPE as t0_SUBTYPE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.TOWNCITY as t0_TOWNCITY, t0.ZIP as t0_ZIP from LOCATION t0 ) m
$sortColumns$

select
from ( select t0.NAME as t0_NAME, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.ADDRESS1 as t0_ADDRESS1, t0.ADDRESS2 as t0_ADDRESS2, t0.ADDRESS3 as t0_ADDRESS3, t0.ALIAS1 as t0_ALIAS1, t0.ALIAS2 as t0_ALIAS2, t0.CREATEDBY2DIMUSER as t0_CREATEDBY2DIMUSER, t0.CREATEDDATE as t0_CREATEDDATE, t0.DESCRIPTION as t0_DESCRIPTION, t0.FAX as t0_FAX, t0.FULLNAME as t0_FULLNAME, t0.ISVISIBLE as t0_ISVISIBLE, t0.LABEL as t0_LABEL, t0.LASTMODIFIEDBY2DIMUSER as t0_LASTMODIFIEDBY2DIMUSER, t0.LASTMODIFIEDDATE as t0_LASTMODIFIEDDATE, t0.LOCATION2FUNCTIONALSTATUS as t0_LOCATION2FUNCTIONALSTATUS, t0.LOCATION2LOCATIONTYPE as t0_LOCATION2LOCATIONTYPE, t0.LOCATION2PARENTLOCATION as t0_LOCATION2PARENTLOCATION, t0.LOCATION2PROVISIONSTATUS as t0_LOCATION2PROVISIONSTATUS, t0.LOCATION2RPBUILDTEMPLATE as t0_LOCATION2RPBUILDTEMPLATE, t0.LOCATIONID as t0_LOCATIONID, t0.MARKEDFORDELETE as t0_MARKEDFORDELETE, t0.NOTES as t0_NOTES, t0.OBJECTID as t0_OBJECTID, t0.PHYSICALX as t0_PHYSICALX, t0.PHYSICALY as t0_PHYSICALY, t0.PHYSICALZ as t0_PHYSICALZ, t0.PROVINCE as t0_PROVINCE, t0.RELATIVENAME as t0_RELATIVENAME, t0.RESPONSIBLE as t0_RESPONSIBLE, t0.SUBSTATUS as t0_SUBSTATUS, t0.SUBTYPE as t0_SUBTYPE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.TOWNCITY as t0_TOWNCITY, t0.ZIP as t0_ZIP from LOCATION t0 ) m
$sortColumns$

select
from ( select t0.NAME as t0_NAME, t0.ADDRESS as t0_ADDRESS, t0.ADDRESS1 as t0_ADDRESS1, t0.ADDRESS2 as t0_ADDRESS2, t0.ADDRESS3 as t0_ADDRESS3, t0.ALIAS1 as t0_ALIAS1, t0.ALIAS2 as t0_ALIAS2, t0.CREATEDBY2DIMUSER as t0_CREATEDBY2DIMUSER, t0.CREATEDDATE as t0_CREATEDDATE, t0.DESCRIPTION as t0_DESCRIPTION, t0.FAX as t0_FAX, t0.FULLNAME as t0_FULLNAME, t0.ISVISIBLE as t0_ISVISIBLE, t0.LABEL as t0_LABEL, t0.LASTMODIFIEDBY2DIMUSER as t0_LASTMODIFIEDBY2DIMUSER, t0.LASTMODIFIEDDATE as t0_LASTMODIFIEDDATE, t0.LOCATION2FUNCTIONALSTATUS as t0_LOCATION2FUNCTIONALSTATUS, t0.LOCATION2LOCATIONTYPE as t0_LOCATION2LOCATIONTYPE, t0.LOCATION2PARENTLOCATION as t0_LOCATION2PARENTLOCATION, t0.LOCATION2PROVISIONSTATUS as t0_LOCATION2PROVISIONSTATUS, t0.LOCATION2RPBUILDTEMPLATE as t0_LOCATION2RPBUILDTEMPLATE, t0.LOCATIONID as t0_LOCATIONID, t0.MARKEDFORDELETE as t0_MARKEDFORDELETE, t0.NOTES as t0_NOTES, t0.OBJECTID as t0_OBJECTID, t0.PHYSICALX as t0_PHYSICALX, t0.PHYSICALY as t0_PHYSICALY, t0.PHYSICALZ as t0_PHYSICALZ, t0.PROVINCE as t0_PROVINCE, t0.RELATIVENAME as t0_RELATIVENAME, t0.RESPONSIBLE as t0_RESPONSIBLE, t0.SUBSTATUS as t0_SUBSTATUS, t0.SUBTYPE as t0_SUBTYPE, t0.TELEPHONE as t0_TELEPHONE, t0.TOWNCITY as t0_TOWNCITY, t0.ZIP as t0_ZIP from LOCATION t0 ) m
